items.title: Show HN: I built a new RSS reader for Hacker News

items.description: WebAssembly continues its rapid growth as developers embrace it for high-performance web applications.

items.description: Exploring how AI is transforming medical diagnostics, treatment planning, and patient care in modern healthcare systems.

items.description: A beginner-friendly guide to one of Rust's most powerful features that ensures memory safety without garbage collection.
